definition: new and different/novelty
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
new/newly/meso- (chemistry)
different/other/hetero-/unusual/strange/surprising/to distinguish/to separate/to discriminate

sentences.english: This example indicates a new way of finding new insecticidal crystal protein.
sentences.chinese: 这为寻找新异杀虫晶体蛋白基因开辟了新的思路。

sentences.english: The existing conditions are always being transcended by the new and the different.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，现存的状况总是在被新异之物所超越。

definition: lit. new bud/fig. new and original
not follow the beaten track/have an original style
novelty/new and odd
to display originality (idiom); to do things differently
to think/to exercise one's mind
to conform to no conventional pattern/unconventional/offbeat
strange and deceitful/sly/treacherous
lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner/to stand out/to develop one's own school/to have attitude of one's own
new idea
interest/point of particular charm and interest
to be full of/to be rich in
to bring in the new (idiom); new directions, different creation
strange and prominent
freak/weird
variant of 簡練|简练[jian3 lian4]
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
